review: Easy set up, works great. I am no techy. This product was easy to install and very simple to use.
author: R. Thompson

review: I love the Chromecast! I don't have any problems and it does exactly what it describes!
author: Teppy

review: Works just like its suppose  too

review: This has helped my family cut the cord and go without satellite or cable.  It's very easy to use and a no-brainier if you have an android phone/tablet and a chrome browser on your PC.  This has actually saved me money by not having to pay for cable anymore.
author: T. Lyden

review: Best $20 I've spent in a long time.
author: Derek A

review: Have four of these. Typical great Google product.
author: William G Harris

review: I wish I had gotten one of these sooner. It's cheaper than comparable alternatives, and works great with dozens of streaming apps and websites. Directions for setup are lacking though, look it up online.
author: Sue
